scripts.prepare-sushiswap-mainnet: cp subgraph.mainnet.yaml subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-apeswap-polygon: mustache ./config/apeswap-polygon.json subgraph.apeswap.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-sushiswap-arbitrum: mustache ./config/sushiswap-arbitrum.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-sushiswap-celo: mustache ./config/sushiswap-celo.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-sushiswap-polygon: mustache ./config/sushiswap-polygon.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-sushiswap-gnosis: mustache ./config/sushiswap-xdai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-traderjoe-avalanche: cp subgraph.joe.yaml subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy-sushiswap-mainnet: npm run prepare-sushiswap-mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/simplefi-sushiswap-farms
scripts.deploy-apeswap-polygon: npm run prepare-apeswap-polygon && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/simplefi-apeswap-farms-polygon
scripts.deploy-sushiswap-arbitrum: npm run prepare-sushiswap-arbitrum && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ simplefi-finance/sushiswap-farms-arbitrum
scripts.deploy-sushiswap-celo: npm run prepare-sushiswap-celo && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/simplefi-sushiswap-farms-celo
scripts.deploy-sushiswap-polygon: npm run prepare-sushiswap-polygon && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/simplefi-sushiswap-farms-polygon
scripts.deploy-sushiswap-gnosis: npm run prepare-sushiswap-xdai && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ simplefi-finance/sushiswap-farms-gnosis
scripts.deploy-traderjoe-avalanche: npm run prepare-traderjoe-avalanche && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/simplefi-traderjoe-farms-avalanche
